name: Warframe
description: This installer is Esync and DXVK ready.
notes:
1) After installation, do not hit 'Play' immediately. Close the installer, then launch the game from lutris.

2) If you get DirectX errors, it means you're missing 32 bit vulkan libraries and/or 32 bit graphic drivers. You need both 32 bit and 64 bit vulkan libraries installed on your system. The reason is because the game is 64 bit but the launcher is 32 bit so the launcher checks for 32 bit. See:

https://github.com/lutris/lutris/wiki/Installing-drivers

3) To save on disk space, you may wish to remove the 'Installer' folder after installation is finished. By default this should be located at /home/username/Games/warframe/Installer


**************************

There is no discord integration in warframe because in order to do so would be against the Warframe TOS:

https://forums.warframe.com/topic/1003139-simple-question-regarding-discord-rpcdll-for-devs/

task.name: wineexec
task.description:
Running Warframe installer. An installer will open.
------------------------------
To progress, manually continue installation in that window.

content:
files:
- offlinedownloader:
    filename: offlinedownloader.sh
    url: https://gitlab.com/snippets/1922761/raw
game:
  arch: win64
  exe: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/users/$USER/Local Settings/Application Data/Warframe/Downloaded/Public/Tools/Launcher.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    arch: win64
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- merge:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/
    src: offlinedownloader
- chmodx: $GAMEDIR/offlinedownloader.sh
- execute:
    description: Downloading Warframe Offline Installer.
    file: $GAMEDIR/offlinedownloader.sh
- task:
    arch: win64
    description: 'Running Warframe installer. An installer will open.

      ------------------------------

      To progress, manually continue installation in that window.'
    executable: $GAMEDIR/Installer/WFInstaller.bat
    name: wineexec
system:
  env:
    PBA_DISABLE: 0
    __GL_SHADER_DISK_CACHE: 1
    __GL_SHADER_DISK_CACHE_PATH: $GAMEDIR
    __GL_THREADED_OPTIMIZATIONS: 1
    mesa_glthread: 'true'
  pulse_latency: true
wine:
  dxvk: true
  esync: true
